trans-unit.source: Manages the user interface (UI) for a smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Administrerer brukergrensesnittet (UI) for et smartkort koden panel.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: You can control the display of your designer's <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> with the DesignerActionUIService class.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kontrollere visningen av din designer <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>DesignerActionUIService klasse.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: DesignerActionUIService provides a straightforward interface for displaying the items for each component, including the following methods and events: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> methods display and hide the items for a component.
trans-unit.target: DesignerActionUIService har et enkelt grensesnitt for å vise elementer for hver komponent, inkludert følgende metoder og hendelser: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>og <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A>metoder vises eller skjules elementene for en komponent.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event indicates when the UI changes for a component.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>Hendelse angir når Brukergrensesnittet endres for en komponent.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> to manage the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> collections associated with your component.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>til å behandle den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>samlingene som er knyttet til komponenten.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a request is made to show or hide a smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en forespørsel til å vise eller skjule et smartkort koden panel.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the set of specialized classes associated with the DesignerActionUIStateChange event.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser settet med spesialiserte klasser som er knyttet til DesignerActionUIStateChange-hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: |Specialized type|Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs>|Adds information specific to smart tag panel management.
trans-unit.target: | Spesialiserte typen | Beskrivelse | |----------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs>| Legger til vil ha informasjon om smart koden panelet management.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: This class is specialized from <xref:System.EventArgs>.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventHandler>|Connects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs> with its handler.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>|Denotes whether the smart tag panel is being displayed or hidden.| For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen er spesialiserte fra <xref:System.EventArgs>. | | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventHandler>| Kobler <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs>behandlingsprogrammet. | | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>| Angir om panelet smart koden som vises eller skjules. | Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventHandler> </xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>.
trans-unit.target: Kall avhending når du er ferdig med <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Opp fjerningsmetoden forlater den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>i en ubrukelig tilstand.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Etter å avhending, må du frigi alle referanser til den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>Slik saneringsoppsamlingen kan gjenvinne minnet som den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>ble bruker.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [Rydder opp uforvaltede ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [implementere metoden fjerne](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid kall fjerne før du slipper siste referanse til <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Ellers ressurser den bruker vil ikke bli frigjort før saneringsoppsamling kall av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>objektets `Finalize` metode.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>

trans-unit.source: Hides the smart tag panel for a component.
trans-unit.target: Skjuler panelet smart koden for en komponent.

trans-unit.source: If the smart tag panel is currently being displayed, the HideUI method will hide it.
trans-unit.target: Hvis panelet smart koden som vises, skjule metoden HideUI den.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event, stipulating <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType> as the event type.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden opphøyer den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>hendelsen stipulating <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>som hendelsestypen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The HideUI and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> methods are implemented only to raise their corresponding events.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For HideUI og <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>metoder implementeres bare hvis du vil øke de tilsvarende hendelsene.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>

trans-unit.source: The actual functionality is found in the handlers for these events, which are part of the design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: Den faktiske funksjonaliteten finnes i behandlingsprogramdelen for disse hendelsene som en del av utformingen-miljøet.

trans-unit.source: The component whose smart tag panel should be hidden.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten med smart koden panelet skal skjules.

trans-unit.source: Updates the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer smart koden panelet.

trans-unit.source: The Refresh method updates the internal `DesignerAction`<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>, as well as the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Metoden oppdatering oppdaterer den interne `DesignerAction` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>, og smart koden panelet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> to refresh.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> å oppdatere.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether to automatically show the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Angir om skal vises automatisk smart koden panelet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> to automatically show.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> skal vises automatisk.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to automatically show the smart tag panel; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>skal vises automatisk smart koden-panelet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Displays the smart tag panel for a component.
trans-unit.target: Viser panelet smart koden for en komponent.

trans-unit.source: If the smart tag panel is currently hidden, the ShowUI method will display the panel.
trans-unit.target: Hvis smart koden panelet er skjult for øyeblikket, vises metoden ShowUI panelet.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event, stipulating <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType> as the event type.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden opphøyer den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>hendelsen stipulating <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>som hendelsestypen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> and ShowUI methods are implemented only to raise their corresponding events.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A>og ShowUI metoder implementeres bare hvis du vil øke de tilsvarende hendelsene.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A>

trans-unit.source: The actual functionality is found in the handlers for these events, which are part of the design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: Den faktiske funksjonaliteten finnes i behandlingsprogramdelen for disse hendelsene som en del av utformingen-miljøet.

trans-unit.source: The component whose smart tag panel should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten med smart kode panelet skal vises.
